requiredbulletpoints.bulletpoint: Drove development as a generalist engineer, crafting major features in the Unity-based client app and supporting backend.

bulletpoints.bulletpoint: Architected and shipped the DJ Deck performance tools, balancing accessibility with depth for hobbyist DJs, increasing user engagement and satisfaction.
Founded and led Wave's Resident DJ Program, elevating user-generated content and boosting community engagement during downtime between major events.
Designed and implemented WaveMaker venue tool, empowering users to create custom virtual venues, enhancing platform customization.
Collaborated with headline artists (John Legend, Imogen Heap) to bring unique VR concert experiences to Wave, strengthening brand prestige and reach.

Conducted in-depth research on VR social safety standards and developed social safety features for Wave VR, setting new standards for user safety, leading to improved community feedback and retention.
Significantly contributed to exploratory project to port VR content to Roblox, enabling Wave to expand into new markets and user demographics.

Managed Wave's social channels, growing brand visibility through interactive campaigns, memes, and professional user engagement. Identified critical user needs through community data analysis, advocating for impactful feature prioritization.
Advocated for critical user-requested features as the community manager, resulting in prioritized development that boosted user satisfaction and platform loyalty.
Analyzed community feedback across social platforms, leading to optimized features that met evolving user expectations.
